channel.title: How to build a cannon (explosive)!
channel.description:
First, you need a large metal pipe. I recommend one about 4 feet long, with the walls AT LEASTE 1/2 inches thick. As for diameter, use what ever has at leaste 1/2 inch thick walls, but is just large enough to allow a CO2 tank to fit in. Ok, now that you have the pipe, get these: Standard CO2 tank (filled). Gun Powder (Amount depends on size of the pipe, I'll show a diagram later). Toilet Paper or tissue. Hard, solid surface to support it. Build a stand if you want. 1. Take the pipe, and close off one end. Close it very tight, I recommend welding it shut. 2. Drill a small hole in the back side (closed end) of the pipe, and make sure it is wide enough to fit a fuse into the inside. 3. Put the fuse in, so about 3 or 4 inches of it is actually inside. Tape it in place if you want. 4. Pack the gun powder into the back of the pipe, look at the diagram to see how much. 5. Pack toilet paper into the back pretty tightly. Again, look at the diagram to see how much. 6. Place the CO2 tank in the back and against the toilet paper. Heres the diagram:
Fuse Hole / ||==| |===============================================| ||==| |===============================================| ||..................|~~~~~~~~~~~~~| |‾‾‾‾‾‾\_ ||..................|~~~~~~~~~~~~~| |______/‾ ||====================================================| ||====================================================| Gun Powder^ T.P. ^ ^CO2 Tank
Now, we have it assembled. Put the back against something very sturdy. Just put the back of it against a wall, and duct tape it down. Be sure you aim it at the target first! Now all you have left to do is light the fuse and RUN. Seriously, this thing has a lot of power and it will do a lot of damage.

item.title: How to build a cannon (explosive)!
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

Yeah, these things are brutal. My uncle made one and he let me watch him shoot it off. He made me stand about 100 feet away though.

It is much louder than a shotgun, if that says anything.

Read full topic

@goatee wrote:

really?? COOL!!! I’m gonna try that on the weekend… got a whole loads of dry woods and crap in my empty pond perfect for bonfires… and a rivers just down the road… gotta protect the windows though otherwise I’ll get bitch slapped.

Nice cannon too…i saw this on TV

item.title: How to build a cannon (explosive)!
item.dc:creator: @jcs_double jcs_double
item.description:
@jcs_double wrote:

[quote=“Aukake, post:12, topic:9510”][quote author=jcs_double link=topic=13669.msg158256#msg158256 date=1155706733]
or you coulf just throw a pebble from a river into a bonfire, kaboom! that’ll put holes in your tent

[/quote]

Explain.

I’ve never seen a bonfire explode without the help of a coleman propane tank.[/quote]

well the peble explodes because the water it has absoebed over the years builds up pressure from the heat fire

item.title: How to build a cannon (explosive)!
item.dc:creator: @Aukake Aukake
item.description:
@Aukake wrote:

Ehm, why would you use a co2 tank as munition? As far as my knowledge goes co2 isn’t explosive. I threw a co2 cannister next to a bonfire then shot at it and… nothing!

Read full topic

item.title: How to build a cannon (explosive)!
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

First, you need a large metal pipe. I recommend one about 4 feet long, with the walls AT LEASTE 1/2 inches thick. As for diameter, use what ever has at leaste 1/2 inch thick walls, but is just large enough to allow a CO2 tank to fit in.

Ok, now that you have the pipe, get these:
Standard CO2 tank (filled).
Gun Powder (Amount depends on size of the pipe, I’ll show a diagram later).
Toilet Paper or tissue.
Hard, solid surface to support it. Build a stand if you want.

  1. Take the pipe, and close off one end. Close it very tight, I recommend welding it shut.
  2. Drill a small hole in the back side (closed end) of the pipe, and make sure it is wide enough to fit a fuse into the inside.
  3. Put the fuse in, so about 3 or 4 inches of it is actually inside. Tape it in place if you want.
  4. Pack the gun powder into the back of the pipe, look at the diagram to see how much.
  5. Pack toilet paper into the back pretty tightly. Again, look at the diagram to see how much.
  6. Place the CO2 tank in the back and against the toilet paper.

Heres the diagram:

Fuse Hole / ||==| |===============================================| ||==| |===============================================| ||..................|~~~~~~~~~~~~~| |‾‾‾‾‾‾\_ ||..................|~~~~~~~~~~~~~| |______/‾ ||====================================================| ||====================================================| Gun Powder^ T.P. ^ ^CO2 Tank

Now, we have it assembled. Put the back against something very sturdy. Just put the back of it against a wall, and duct tape it down. Be sure you aim it at the target first!

Now all you have left to do is light the fuse and RUN. Seriously, this thing has a lot of power and it will do a lot of damage.

Read full topic
